nodes.text: Red Wing was a starfighter squadron that served in the Naval Fleet of the Galactic Republic and flew Aurek-class tactical strikefighter during the Jedi Civil War. It was one of several units instrumental in bringing the Old Sith Wars to an end.

Red Wing participated in the successful Republic assault on the Star Forge in 3956 BBY. When Jedi Knight Bastila Shan—after having been redeemed by Revan—shifted the use of her battle meditation to aid the Republic fleet under the command of Admiral Forn Dodonna, Red Wing was ordered to reinforce the breach in the Sith fleet's battle formation that had been made by Green Wing, opening a hole for the rest of Dodonna's capital ships. This proved the turning point of the Battle of Rakata Prime that would see the end of the conflict.
In 3951 BBY, under the command of Admiral Carth Onasi, Red Wing participated in the Battle of Telos IV, alongside Blue Wing, where it fought against the Sith forces of Darth Nihilus.
